text: læa phung ru theid wa thæcring sing dı thi phwk cea di ma cak kar tha suk nan nænxn hnung nı ha khxng man pen khx ngxallxhˌ læa pen khxng rx sul læa pen khxng yati thi kıl chid læa brrda dek kaphra læa brrda phu khadsn læa phu deinthang hak phwk cea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa sing thi rea di hı lng ma kæ baw khxng rea nı wan hæng kar canæk rahwang kar sraththa læa kar ptiseth khux wan thi sxng fay phechiy kan læa xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng dechanuphaph henux thuksingthukxyang
